text.0:
#ICYMI: In a public address on Nov. 17, President Rodrigo Duterte wrongly claimed Vice President Leni Robredo chimed into online criticisms of his supposed absence (#NasaanAngPangulo) during the height of back-to-back typhoons that struck the country.

https://t.co/Wp7MT2lDK9 https://t.co/UZGQDaqqXB
text.1:
We are re-sharing this article from December 2019, when a QC Regional Trial Court convicted brothers Andal Ampatuan Jr. and former ARMM Governor Zaldy Ampatuan, and several police officers for the murder of 57 people, many of whom were media workers.

https://t.co/GkB1hfwLDC
text.2: Justice also remains yet to be served for the 58th victim of the worst case of election-related violence in Philippine history.
text.3: The @DOJPH indicted eight more people in the second wave of cases against perpetrators of the Maguindanao massacre, but dismissed the charges against 40 others.
